subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Andrew Cashner, whose fastball averaged 97.7 miles an hour in 2012, has a chance to emerge as the star of San Diego’s pitching staff, which has been vexed by injuries.
snippet: Andrew Cashner, whose fastball averaged 97.7 miles an hour in 2012, has a chance to emerge as the star of San Diego’s pitching staff, which has been vexed by injuries.
